meta.title: Some exciting updates on Loci
meta.author: lyc
meta.summary: Thanks to everyone who has tried out Loci over the past month! We're excited to share some updates after taking into account your feedback:

meta.title: Loci is now in public beta!
meta.author: lyc
meta.summary: After a long wait, we are delighted to share that our collaborative online whiteboard, Loci, is now in public beta!
